english.segment1: When all the world is blossoming. And everything around is bursting into life. And I don't have to strain to hear the beat of Your heart
english.segment2: When all the world is under fire. When skies are threatening to thunder and rain. And I am overcome by fears that I can't see
english.segment3: If everything is Yours. Everything is Yours. If everything is Yours. I'm letting it go. No, it was never mine to hold. No, never mine
english.segment4: Who could command the stars to sing. Or hold the raging seas from breaking through the doors?. And tend the fragile roses with the very same hands
english.segment5: If everything is Yours. Everything is Yours. If everything is Yours. I'm letting it go. I am, I'm letting it go, letting go. Yeah, I'm letting it go
english.segment6: 'Cause everything is Yours. Yeah, everything is Yours
english.segment7: If everything is Yours, God. And everything is Yours. If everything is Yours. I'm letting it go, let it go, let it go, let it go
english.segment8: It was never mine, no, no. It was never mine, never mine. [Incomprehensible] no
